ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] I posted this to the Everwhatever boards and to the  Concert Hall
ygData.msgSnippet: having spent all weekend in dicso 2 and breaking disco on the way in, i think disco would only be doable with a level 60 puller.  disco 2 you might be able to
ygData.messageBody:
having spent all weekend in dicso 2 and breaking disco on the way in, i think disco would only
be doable with a level 60 puller. disco 2 you might be able to get away with a bard charming if
you've also got a necro or a pally/cleric who is good at rooting stuff away from the fight. in the
''library'' (what a cool looking room btw) we had a couple fights where we ended up killing 6 in
the same fight, but we also had some where we were able to kill 2, then 1 more, then a couple
roamers in separate fights.

At 06:19 AM 10/14/00 -0400, you wrote:
>Jeffrey Sue wrote:
>
> > At 02:53 PM 10/11/00 -0700, you wrote:
> > >If a bard could even keep 3 mezzed it would at least make grouping at
> > >50+ a bit more fun than having to sit around until an enchanter logged
> > >on to go to Sebilis or HS. Once you pass 55 even pickup groups in
> > >Karnors stop being an option as the front mobs turn mostly green.
> >
> > i've been getting pickup groups in sebilis at 53. we've done guardian, zone
> > in and zone out without enchanters. i think the jail is also doable without
> > an enchanter but the only time i was there, we happened to have one.
> > subject submissions.
>
>I've done the jail ("4 necros" on my server) without an Enchanter. You really shouldn't get more than 3
>things at once, and once you break the spawns up, it's easy. Disco is supposed to be doable also.
>
>Kenross Cantoforjado, 53 songs, Innoruuk
>
>
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
